meanings.definition: A demonstration held in opposition to another demonstration.
meanings.sent1: During the protest, there were loud counterdemonstrations from the other side.
meanings.sent2: The counterdemonstrations added to the chaos of the rally.
meanings.sent3: The counterdemonstrations featured colorful signs and chants.
meanings.sent4: The clash between the two groups led to intense counterdemonstrations.
meanings.sent5: The counterdemonstrations effectively conveyed the opposing views.

meanings.definition: The act of demonstrating in opposition to a demonstration.
meanings.sent1: She organized the counterdemonstrations to peacefully express dissent.
meanings.sent2: The counterdemonstrations highlighted the diversity of opinions in the community.
meanings.sent3: The counterdemonstrations brought a sense of unity among the protestors.
meanings.sent4: His speech inspired many to join the counterdemonstrations.
meanings.sent5: The counterdemonstrations were a powerful response to the initial protest.
